mapper.sql: SQN, BAT_NO, COM_NO, TXN_TLR, SUB_DTE, CUS_AC, CUS_NME, TXN_AMT, THD_CUS_NO, THD_CUS_NME, RSV_FLD1, RSV_FLD2, RSV_FLD3, RSV_FLD4, RSV_FLD5, RSV_FLD6, RSV_FLD7

mapper.update:
update ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_ZHAG_BATCH_TEMP
BAT_NO = #{batNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
COM_NO = #{comNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
TXN_TLR = #{txnTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
SUB_DTE = #{subDte,jdbcType=DATE},
CUS_AC = #{cusAc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUS_NME = #{cusNme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_AMT = #{txnAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THD_CUS_NO = #{thdCusNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THD_CUS_NME = #{thdCusNme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD1 = #{rsvFld1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD2 = #{rsvFld2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD3 = #{rsvFld3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD4 = #{rsvFld4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD5 = #{rsvFld5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD6 = #{rsvFld6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD7 = #{rsvFld7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SQN = #{sqn,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
insert into ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_ZHAG_BATCH_TEMP ( SQn, BAT_NO, COM_NO, TXN_TLR, SUB_DTE, CUS_AC, CUS_NME, TXN_AMT, THD_CUS_NO, THD_CUS_NME, RSV_FLD1, RSV_FLD2, RSV_FLD3, RSV_FLD4, RSV_FLD5, RSV_FLD6, RSV_FLD7) values
( #{item.sqn}, #{item.batNo}, #{item.comNo}, #{item.txnTlr}, #{item.subDte}, #{item.cusAc}, #{item.cusNme}, #{item.txnAmt}, #{item.thdCusNo}, #{item.thdCusNme}, #{item.rsvFld1}, #{item.rsvFld2}, #{item.rsvFld3}, #{item.rsvFld4}, #{item.rsvFld5}, #{item.rsvFld6}, #{item.rsvFld7})

select count(*) as TOT_COUNT,sum(TXN_AMT) as ALL_MONEY from GDEUPSB.GDEUPS_ZHAG_BATCH_TEMP
where BAT_NO=#{batNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.update: update GDEUPSB.GDEUPS_ZHAG_BATCH_TEMP set RSV_FLD2= #{rsvFld2,jdbcType=CHAR},TXN_AMT=#{txnAmt,jdbcType=CHAR} where SQN = #{sqn,jdbcType=CHAR}

update ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_ZHAG_BATCH_TEMP
BAT_NO = #{batNo,jdbcType=CHAR},

THD_CUS_NO = #{thdCusNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THD_CUS_NME = #{thdCusNme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD1 = #{rsvFld1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD2 = #{rsvFld2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
